processingCommand.script:
IF "${ValidationTDF}"=="" GOTO SKIPSTEP
:IMPORT
Echo on
${XT_XENO_TASKPROCESSOR} ${ValidationTDF} /S
Echo Off
set retcode=%errorlevel%
echo TaskProcessor ended with return code: %retcode%
IF "${ContinueOnError}"=="TRUE" (
   IF %retcode% NEQ 0 (
      echo Error ignored as ContinueOnError=TRUE
   )
)
IF "${ContinueOnError}"=="TRUE" set retcode=0
IF %retcode% EQU 0 GOTO NORMALFLOW
GOTO ERRORFLOW
:NORMALFLOW
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:ERRORFLOW
set resexe=1
GOTO END
:SKIPSTEP
Echo ValidationTDF variable is not defined, step is skipped
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:END
exit %resexe%
